name: Def Jam Rapstar
description:
The ultimate MC experience, DEF JAM RAPSTAR is the only music game that focuses exclusively on Hip Hop. With 45 tracks spanning the history of Hip Hop, DEF JAM RAPSTAR allows you to rap along with friends in Party mode, polish your skills in Career mode, or create your own songs in Freestyle mode using exclusive tracks by some of today’s hottest Hip Hop producers.

Features

• 40 tracks spanning the history of Hip-Hop, Rap with friends of create your own rhymes
